scripts.deploy: vue-cli-service build --mode develop; firebase deploy --only hosting:develop-candidate-app -P develop
scripts.deploy-develop: vue-cli-service build --mode develop; firebase deploy --only hosting:develop-candidate-app -P develop
scripts.deploy-staging: vue-cli-service build --mode staging; firebase deploy --only hosting:staging-candidate-app -P staging
scripts.deploy-production: vue-cli-service build --mode production; firebase deploy --only hosting:production-candidate-app -P production
scripts.deploy-service-offline:develop: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp service-offline/index.html dist/index.html && firebase deploy --only hosting:develop-candidate-app -P develop
scripts.deploy-service-offline:staging: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp service-offline/index.html dist/index.html && firebase deploy --only hosting:staging-candidate-app -P staging
scripts.deploy-service-offline:production: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp service-offline/index.html dist/index.html && firebase deploy --only hosting:production-candidate-app -P production
